original_text: They will be weeping as they come. They will pray for my help as I lead them. I will lead them beside streams of fresh water, and on flat paths where they will not fall down. I will help them because I am a father for Israel's people. Ephraim is like my firstborn son.’ 31: Israel and Ephraim were names for the north kingdom. They will be weeping as they come. They will pray for my help as I lead them. I will lead them beside streams of fresh water, and on flat paths where they will not fall down. I will help them because I am a father for Israel's people. Ephraim is like my firstborn son.’ 31: Israel and Ephraim were names for the north kingdom. They will be weeping as they come.
korean_text: 그들이 울며 돌아오리니 나의 인도함을 받고 간구할 때에 내가 그들을 넘어지지 아니하고 물 있는 계곡의 곧은 길로 가게 하리라 나는 이스라엘의 아버지요 에브라임은 나의 장자니라

sentences.original_text: They will be weeping as they come.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 올 때 울고 있을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will pray for my help
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나의 도움을 위해 기도할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will lead them beside streams of fresh water,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 맑은 물 시냇가로 인도할 것이며,

sentences.original_text: where they will not fall down.
because I am a father for Israel's people.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 나는 이스라엘 백성을 위한 아버지이기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: Ephraim is like my firstborn son.
Israel and Ephraim were names for the north kingdom.
They will be weeping as they come.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 올 때 울고 있을 것이다.
